agent.models.model_building_blocks.ConvBlocks

class agent.models.model_building_blocks.ConvBlocks(num_conv_blocks, num_conv_filters, conv_kernel_size, activation=<function relu>, max_pool=False, max_pool_kernel_size=4, conv_padding='valid')

Bases: object

Class for creating multiple convolution blocks.

num_conv_blocks

The number of convolution blocks to create.

Type

int

num_conv_filters

The number of filters in each convolution block.

Type

int

conv_kernel_size

The size of the convolution kernel.

Type

int or tuple

activation

The activation function to use after each convolutional layer. Default is tf.nn.relu.

Type

function

max_pool

Whether or not to use max pooling after each convolutional layer. Default is False.

Type

bool

max_pool_kernel_size

The size of the max pooling kernel. Default is 4.

Type

int or tuple

conv_padding

The padding to use for convolutional layers. Default is “valid”.

Type

str

__init__(num_conv_blocks, num_conv_filters, conv_kernel_size, activation=<function relu>, max_pool=False, max_pool_kernel_size=4, conv_padding='valid')

Initializes an instance of the ConvBlocks class.

Parameters

  • num_conv_blocks (int) – The number of convolution blocks to create.

  • num_conv_filters (int) – The number of filters in each convolution block.

  • conv_kernel_size (int or tuple) – The size of the convolution kernel.

  • activation (function) – The activation function to use after each convolutional layer. Default is tf.nn.relu.

  • max_pool (bool) – Whether or not to use max pooling after each convolutional layer. Default is False.

  • max_pool_kernel_size (int or tuple) – The size of the max pooling kernel. Default is 4.

  • conv_padding (str) – The padding to use for convolutional layers. Default is “valid”.

Methods

__init__(num_conv_blocks, num_conv_filters, ...)

Initializes an instance of the ConvBlocks class.
